actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Great Prairie Lakes National Recreation Area in the States of South Dakota, North Dakota, and Nebraska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Great Prairie Lakes National Recreation Area in the States of South Dakota, North Dakota, and Nebraska, to be administered by the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, as an integral part of a general comprehensive water resources development plan for the Missouri River Basin.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Great Prairie Lakes National Recreation Area in the States of South Dakota, North Dakota, and Nebraska, and for other purposes.
